fields.name: Cancel
fields.description: To trigger cancel for entire migration we need to send this flag as True

fields.name: CurrentStatus
fields.description: Current status of migration

fields.name: DbsToCancelMigrationOn
fields.description: When you want to trigger cancel for specific databases send cancel flag as True and database names in this array

fields.name: DbsToMigrate
fields.description: Number of databases to migrate

fields.name: DbsToTriggerCutoverOn
fields.description: When you want to trigger cutover for specific databases send triggerCutover flag as True and database names in this array

fields.name: MigrationId
fields.description: ID for migration, a GUID.

fields.name: MigrationMode
fields.description: There are two types of migration modes Online and Offline

fields.name: MigrationWindowEndTimeInUtc
fields.description: End time in UTC for migration window

fields.name: MigrationWindowStartTimeInUtc
fields.description: Start time in UTC for migration window

fields.name: OverwriteDbsInTarget
fields.description: Indicates whether the databases on the target server can be overwritten, if already present. If set to False, the migration workflow will wait for a confirmation, if it detects that the database already exists.

fields.name: SecretParameters
fields.description: Migration secret parameters

fields.name: SetupLogicalReplicationOnSourceDbIfNeeded
fields.description: Indicates whether to setup LogicalReplicationOnSourceDb, if needed

fields.name: SourceDbServerFullyQualifiedDomainName
fields.description: Source server fully qualified domain name or ip. It is a optional value, if customer provide it, dms will always use it for connection

fields.name: SourceDbServerMetadata
fields.description: Metadata of the source database server

fields.name: SourceDbServerResourceId
fields.description: ResourceId of the source database server

fields.name: StartDataMigration
fields.description: Indicates whether the data migration should start right away

fields.name: TargetDbServerFullyQualifiedDomainName
fields.description: Target server fully qualified domain name or ip. It is a optional value, if customer provide it, dms will always use it for connection

fields.name: TargetDbServerMetadata
fields.description: Metadata of the target database server

fields.name: TargetDbServerResourceId
fields.description: ResourceId of the source database server

fields.name: TriggerCutover
fields.description: To trigger cutover for entire migration we need to send this flag as True
